Employment and Volunteering Opportunities

At Premier Consumer Credit Counseling®, we are always looking for qualified people to join our family.

If you are willing to help your community, and are a certified credit counselor or are willing to become one and help hundreds of families, we welcome you to apply.

The following positions are available:

Receptionist: Attending and redirecting incoming calls. Organization and phone skills. Able to multi task

Customer Service Reps Credit Counselors: great pay + benefits. Credit Counseling experience preferred, but we are willing to train.

Certified Counselor: (F/T) Responsible for providing professional customer service in accordance with quality assurance efforts. Must have strong customer service and communication skills.

Also if you would like to volunteer your time, and join our volunteer based projects please contact us.

TO APPLY: Please submit a resume or application for the position you are applying for using the contact information on the right.

Contact Information

Mail to:
Premier Consumer Credit Counseling®
5201 Blue Lagoon Drive, Suite 800
Miami, FL 33126-7050

Phone: 1.800.296.4950

Fax: 305.827.3778
